questions.question: How do you drink your coffee?

options.title: Capsule
options.text: Compatible with Nespresso systems and similar brewers

options.title: Filter
options.text: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60

options.title: Expresso
options.text: Dense and finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience

options.title: Single Origin
options.text: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm

options.title: Decaf
options.text: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed

options.title: Blended
options.text: Combination of two or three dark roasted beans of organic coffees

options.title: 250g
options.text: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

options.title: 500g
options.text: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

options.title: 1000g
options.text: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

options.title: Whole bean
options.text: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience
